CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 20, 1957, pg. 28, reads: "Not Clear Enough? - Do you think this "NO PARKING AT ANY TIME," sign on the telephone pole in 500 block of Herron Ave. is legible enough for English-speaking people to read and understand? Or should it be printed in Arabic and a wailing siren attached? No doubt these parking violators, if tagged, would plead poor legibility of the sign. Such violations are an every day and night occurrence on this "Dodge City" thoroughfare...Harris Photos"
TitMainTitle: Herron Avenue street scene with businesses and Gulf station, Hill District
